sourcesContent:
<template></template>
<script>
import { Bar } from "vue-chartjs";
import {
  Chart as ChartJS,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  BarElement,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale,
} from "chart.js";

ChartJS.register(
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  BarElement,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale
);

export default {
  name: "BarChart",
  components: { Bar },
  props: {
    chartData: {
      type: Object,
      required: true,
    },
    options: {
      type: Object,
      required: false,
      default: () => ({}),
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.renderChart();
  },
  methods: {
    renderChart() {
      new Bar(this.$refs.barChart, {
        data: this.chartData,
        options: this.options,
      });
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style></style>
